result.markdown:
--- title: bc_dim --- ## Predict Broadcasted dimensions {.unnumbered} ### Description bc_dim(x, y) gives the dimensions an array would have, as the result of an broadcasted binary element-wise operation between 2 arrays x and y. ### Usage 
bc_dim(x, y)
### Arguments
x, y an atomic or recursive array.
### Value Returns the recycled array. ### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("broadcast") x.dim <- c(10:8) x.len <- prod(x.dim) x.data <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE, NA), x.len, TRUE) x <- array(x.data, x.dim) y <- array(1:50, c(10,1,1)) dim(bc.b(x, y, "&")) == bc_dim(x, y) ## [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE dim(bc.b(x, y, "|")) == bc_dim(x, y) ## [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE ``` :::
